DOC.brief_summary: This study use sunitinib patient end treatment previous sunitinib malate protocol continue receive sunitinib . The patient must enrol one follow study : A6181030 , A6181064 , A6181078 , A6181087 , A6181094 , A6181107 , A6181108 , A6181110 , A6181111 , A6181112 , A6181113 , A6181120 , A6181126 A6181170 . Other Pfizer sponsor sunitinib study may include future .
DOC.brief_title: A Continuation Study Using Sunitinib Malate For Patients Leaving Treatment On A Previous Sunitinib Study .
DOC.criteria: Must end treatment one follow sunitinib study : A6181030 , A6181064 , A6181078 , A6181087 , A6181094 , A6181107 , A6181108 , A6181110 , A6181111 , A6181112 , A6181113 , A6181120 , A6181126 A6181170 . Other Pfizer sponsor sunitinib study may include future . See inclusion criterion
